mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address (address_seq, name, zip_code, address1, address2, tel, member_id) VALUES (seq_address.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{zipCode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{tel}, #{memberId})
mapper.update: UPDATE address SET name = #{name}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, tel = #{tel}, member_id = #{memberId} WHERE address_seq = #{addressSeq}
